APP_SEO.title: Rick & Morty
APP_SEO.description: PoC Angular + PWA + NgRx + Router State + Formly + NgRx-Entity with Rick&Morty API

SEO.title: Characters
SEO.description: Characters list of Rick & Morty with filter and information of gender, species, type, origin and location

SEO_DETAILS.title: {{ name }}
SEO_DETAILS.description: Information about the character {{ name }} of Rick & Morty with gender, species, type, origin, location and the episodes list

SEO.title: Locations
SEO.description: Locations list of Rick & Morty with filter and information of name, type, dimension and residents

SEO_DETAILS.title: {{ name }}
SEO_DETAILS.description: Information about the location {{ name }} of Rick & Morty with name, type, dimension and the residents list

SEO.title: Episodes
SEO.description: Episodes of Rick & Morty with filter and information of number, episode, name, air date and characters

SEO_DETAILS.title: {{ name }}
SEO_DETAILS.description: Information about the episode {{ name }} of Rick & Morty with number, episode, name, air date and the characters list

VALIDATIONS.MIN_LENGTH_NOT_TEXT: This field must have at least {{number}} numeric characters.
VALIDATIONS.MIN_LENGTH: This field must have at least {{number}} characters
VALIDATIONS.MAX_LENGTH: This field must be less than {{number}} characters
VALIDATIONS.MIN: This field must be greater than {{number}}
VALIDATIONS.MAX: This field must be less than {{number}}
VALIDATIONS.MIN_OR_EQUALS: This field must be greater than or equal to {{number}}
VALIDATIONS.MAX_OR_EQUALS: This field must be less than or equal to {{number}}
VALIDATIONS.RANGE: This field must be greater than or equal to {{min}} and less than or equal to {{max}}
VALIDATIONS.EMAIL: The email address is not valid
VALIDATIONS.PATTERN: This field must comply with the specified format
VALIDATIONS.SPANISH_ID: The document ID is not valid

ERRORS.RETRY: If this problem persists, please try again later or contact us
ERRORS.BACKEND: There has been a problem connecting to our servers
